annotations.description: Title of the checklist; 1-255 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: Title of the checklist; 1-255 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: Title of the checklist; 1-255 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the title. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the title. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the title. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: List of special entities that appear in the title, which can be specified instead of parse_mode. Currently, only bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, spoiler, and custom_emoji entities are allowed.
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the title, which can be specified instead of parse_mode. Currently, only bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, spoiler, and custom_emoji entities are allowed.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of special entities that appear in the title, which can be specified instead of parse_mode. Currently, only *bold*, *italic*, *underline*, *strikethrough*, *spoiler*, and *custom_emoji* entities are allowed.
annotations.name: title_entities

annotations.description: List of 1-30 tasks in the checklist
annotations.rst_description: List of 1-30 tasks in the checklist
annotations.name: tasks

annotations.description: Pass True if other users can add tasks to the checklist
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True if other users can add tasks to the checklist
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` if other users can add tasks to the checklist
annotations.name: others_can_add_tasks

annotations.description: Pass True if other users can mark tasks as done or not done in the checklist
annotations.html_description: Optional. Pass True if other users can mark tasks as done or not done in the checklist
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Pass :code:`True` if other users can mark tasks as done or not done in the checklist
annotations.name: others_can_mark_tasks_as_done
